page.title: 08SHOPS OF OADBY
page.content: In our area of Oadby there are 87 shops, 32 food shops and 55 non-food shops. Our largest shop is Woolco which is a hypermarket. Woolco is popular because it is open until 8.00pm and suitable for disabled people. Oadby has three supermarkets which sell all sorts of food e.g. frozen foods, greengrocers, health foods, bakers, butchers, cheese and hot food shops. Among the non-food shops there is a great variety, e.g. vets, hairdressers, electrical goods, shoes, clothes, furniture, toys, jewellery, chemist and paper shops. There is a "Do It Yourself" shop which sells goods to improve the house and garden. We counted 2 betting shops where people go to gamble on horse races and dog races. There is an "Oxfam"shop which sells unwanted goods and the proceeds go to charity.
